features: Naturally anti-colic: 84% of moms who tested agreed the Tommee Tippee Anti Colic bottle had successfully reduced their baby’s colic symptoms
Breast-like: Our soft silicone, breast-like nipple feels closer to skin and flexes like mom for a natural latch and a comfortable feed - voted mom's #1 bottle for switching between breast and bottle
Less air, more smiles: Tommee Tippee anti colic baby bottles have an Anti-colic tube that draws air away from milk to reduce colic symptoms for less gas, less reflux and less discomfort
Heat sensing technology: The venting tube features an in-built heat sensing strip that turns pink when baby’s milk is too hot
Mom recommended: 95% of moms would recommend Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic bottles to others
body.description: With our award-winning** Advanced Anti-Colic baby bottle, switching between breast and bottle feeding has never been simpler. With our breast-like nipple and unique anti-colic technology, it could just be the best thing for baby, since you! Inspired by mom, designed by experts. This is no ordinary bottle. Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic bottles work a little differently from regular bottles to help combat colic while ensuring a comfortable feeding experience for you and your baby. The unique 3-piece anti-colic venting system draws air away from milk and the star valve keeps milk from traveling up the tube, meaning less gas, reflux and discomfort – 84% of moms who used our anti-colic bottles agreed they reduced their baby’s colic symptoms.* Plus, the anti-colic venting tube comes with a built-in heat sensing strip that gives you extra reassurance that the milk is a safe temperature for baby. Loved by moms and babies, our easy latch-on, breast-like nipple feels closer to skin and mimics the natural flex and movement of a mom's breast for a comfortable feeding. 95% of moms reported that their baby accepted the super soft silicone nipple with skin-like feel and would recommend to others.* Easy to clean and suitable for use in the dishwasher, microwave and steam sterilisers. 100% BPA-free for complete peace of mind. Which flow rate do I need? We offer different flow rates to keep up with your growing baby. Every baby is different but as a guide we suggest slow flow for 0+ months, medium flow for 3+ months and fast flow for 6+ months. Advanced Anti-Colic nipples are only compatible with Advanced Anti-Colic bottles. How often should I replace the bottle nipples? We recommend changing your bottle nipples every two months. And you should change them immediately if they're damaged or weak. * Based on 2021 study of 524 parents who use Tommee Tippee bottles. ** Made for Mums March 2020

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Naturally anti-colic This is no ordinary bottle. Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic bottles works a little differently from regular bottles to help combat colic while ensuring a comfortable feeding experience for you and your baby. Less air, more smiles Our unique 3-piece anti-colic venting system draws air away from milk and the star valve keeps milk from traveling up the tube meaning less wind, reflux and discomfort. 84% of moms agreed our Anti-Colic bottles successfully reduced their baby’s colic symptoms. * Breast-like nipple Our soft silicone, breast-like nipple feels closer to skin and flexes like mom for a natural latch and supports in the transition between breast and bottle. 95% of moms reported that their baby accepted our nipple and would recommend to others. *

Easy hold The easy hold bottle can be held in 3 ways-- cradled comfortably in the hand, gripped in the same way as a traditional wide neck bottle, or held from the base, allowing baby to feed in a natural position and making feeding comfortable for everyone. Heat-sensing technology The anti-colic venting tube comes with a built-in heat sensing gives you extra reassurance when feeding baby as the strip will turn pink when baby’s milk is too hot. Easy clean and BPA free The wide neck bottle makes cleaning easy and the bottles are suitable for use in the dishwasher, microwave and sterilisers. All Tommee Tippee bottles are BPA and phthalate free for your ultimate reassurance.

Go with the flow We offer different flow rates to keep up with your growing baby. Every baby is different but as a guide we suggest slow flow and vari flow for 0+months, medium flow for 3+ months and fast flow for 6+ months. Change me Our nipples are silky soft. Change them if they get damaged or bitten by tiny teeth. Closer to Nature Advanced Anti-Colic baby bottles are ONLY compatible with Advanced Anti-Colic nipples and cannot be used with standard Closer to Nature bottle nipples. Squeeze me Squeeze me The following are all potential signs that you may need to increase the bottle nipple flow rate: • The bottle nipple collapses during feeding. • It takes longer than 20 minutes for baby to finish a bottle. • Baby tugs at the nipple. • Baby falls asleep mid-bottle.

Closer to Nature Closer to Nature Glass Closer to Nature Silicone Advanced Anti-Colic Bottle material: Plastic Borosilicate glass Silicone Plastic Breast-like teat for a natural latch ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Teat flexes like mum for a comfortable feed ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-colic valve in teat ✓ ✓ ✓ Unique anti-colic straw draws air away from milk ✓ Sizes available: 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce, 11 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce Replacement teats available: Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Added Cereal Flow Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Added Cereal Flow Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Added Cereal Flow Slow Flow, Medium flow, Fast Flow BPA Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not the easiest to clean, but worked the best for my daughter with feeding difficulties
reviews.reviewText: This bottle has several parts with small holes that require a thin, narrow brush to clean, so it isn’t the easiest to wash. There is a clear, rubber piece that I have had to fish out of the garbage disposal a few times as it is easy to lose track of in soapy water. I would compare it to the Dr. Brown’s bottles in this regard.However, they are comfortable for me to hold while feeding my daughter and have worked the best for her out of any bottle that we have tried. She has medical complications which have made it challenging for her to eat by mouth since birth, but with this bottle she has been able to consistently take an entire feed without choking or spitting up. They worked much better for us than the Dr. Brown’s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Before I go into what I dislike, a few nice features are
reviews.reviewText: We bought these on a whim, as I am currently using the standard 5oz. Tommie Tippee bottles for my son and need some more bottles to send with him to daycare. I am exclusively pumping and feeding breastmilk via these bottles. I do have to supplement with formula occasionally. I have used this bottle twice thus far. Before I go into what I dislike, a few nice features are: Heat sensor along the internal 'anti-colic' device and the wide diameter nipple. This is the same nipple as seen in the standard bottle but I really like it as it mimics the breast well.The problem I am having with this bottle is my son suckles hard and the nipple collapses on itself. This frustrates him (and me!). The nipple flow is faster than my '0' nipples and it is apparent when he can suck down 4 oz in no time. For those who are still breastfeeding, and have a slow let-down, this may cause an issue with your child. I was using faster flow nipples initially when I had to start formula and this caused an "instant gratification" issue with my babe. He was not happy to wait for my let down at the breast. Additionally, I tried to shake up some formula in the bottle without the colic device in place and it got everywhere. It would be nice if the company offered a cap with this type of bottle.Overall, still happy with the company, but I will probably put these bottles aside until he is older. Coincidentally, the largest "spit up" I had with my son I a few weeks was after one of the feedings with this bottle. I certainly don't think it was directly causative and I haven't used the product enough to reliably comment on its 'anti-colic' properties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for us
reviews.reviewText: Great bottles but my daughter was not interested in them

reviews.reviewTitle: THIS PRODUCT IS THE BEST ON MARKET!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This bottle has worked wonders...from when my baby was a new born up until 6 months old. It truly helped me avoid my baby being colic. The accessories are easy to clean, and the middle stick actually changes color for you to know when the milk is too hot and when it's at perfect temperature. I would highly recommend this product.
fue un regalo para un cuñado y los usa a diario muy buena marca

At first I was bit annoyed with the bottle due to it having a few extra parts (vent) but since it does a very good job at getting my son to finish his bottle quickly it is worth it. We recently switched to the level two nipple and no issues ! Love these bottles.
